column4: Númenórean]] of royal blood, and was the son of [[Eärendur (son of Tar-Amandil)
column5: Eärendur]], who was the younger son of [[King of Númenor
column6: King]] [[Tar-Amandil]]. He himself had one son, [[Malantur]]. Almost nothing is known of his life.<ref>{{UT

column1: ''Caliondo'' appears to be a longer form of the name Calion (cf. [[Ar-Pharazôn
column2: Tar-Calion]]), which means "Son of Light" in [[Quenya]].
